review_en: QUALITY_UNACCEPTABLE: I received someone's returned package with the box opened.

The utensil holder doesnt stay on. Its very sturdy, but sits awkwardly on my sink....but maybe its just my sink. I wish it were just a tad deeper because big plates can easily get knocked over onto the floor if youre not careful.
ORDERED_WRONG_ITEM: nice item but did not fit our sink
DEFECTIVE: The product doesn't quite work for Science sinks, not quite the right size/fit
DEFECTIVE: The product doesn't quite work for Science sinks, not quite the right size/fit
